Summary: Bright green light similar to a military flare 20 deg above horizon falling at 45 deg and vanishing about 10 digs above horizon
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around September 19th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was facing south while investigating a vehicle accident on interstate 278 ( i am a police officer) when a bright green object with a trail appeared at 20 degs +\- above the horizon and fell at a 45 deg angle down and to the right (as i observed it). it vanished at about 10 degs above the horizon and it lasted 5 seconds or less. it was very similar to a military flare but nothing like a firework. however i saw it appear and lose altitude then disappear. if i saw it eject from the ground i would have believed it to be a flare or even a fire work but it's appearance mid air was odd. no aircraft were low enough to emit it otherwise i would have thought it a flare like one ejected from military aircraft to distract anti air missiles.(however unlikely over new york city) would have thought it was a meteor but being green and moving fast and it's size ruled that out. it was too large for a shooting star. if assuming the object was the size of a standard military flare i would estimate it's distance at under 500 feet away. i am prior military and have seen many flares. was it an alien... doubtful. was it unidentified and flying? yes
